description: List all the AvailabilityConfiguration's for the given WorkMail organization.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization for which the AvailabilityConfiguration's will be listed.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityConfigurations
nested_items.description: The list of AvailabilityConfiguration's that exist for the specified WorkMail organization.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: Displays the domain to which the provider applies.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: Displays the provider type that applies to this domain.

nested_items.name: EwsProvider
nested_items.description: If ProviderType is EWS, then this field contains RedactedEwsAvailabilityProvider. Otherwise, it is not required.

nested_items.name: EwsEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of the remote EWS server.

nested_items.name: EwsUsername
nested_items.description: The username used to authenticate the remote EWS server.

nested_items.name: LambdaProvider
nested_items.description: If ProviderType is LAMBDA then this field contains LambdaAvailabilityProvider. Otherwise, it is not required.

nested_items.name: LambdaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda that acts as the availability provider.

nested_items.name: DateCreated
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the availability configuration was created.

nested_items.name: DateModified
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the availability configuration was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. The value is null when there are no further results to return.
